5. Councilmember Paula Goode

# Councilmember Paula Goode Profile

## Profile

Position 6

Term: January 2024 - December 2027  

Paula Goode was born and raised in Southern California. Her father was in industrial building design and founded Architectural Pottery. He also worked for Walt Disney for many years. In 1977, she moved with her whole family to Seattle. In 2019, she moved from Ballard to Lake Forest Park after purchasing the Sheridan Market property.

![Councilmember Paula Goode](https://www.cityoflfp.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=11491 "Councilmember Paula Goode")

## City and Regional Representation

Member, City Council Budget and Finance Committee

Alternate, Lake Ballinger/McAleer Creek Watershed Forum

Alternate, Water Resource Inventory Area 8 Salmon Recovery Council (WRIA 8)

## Education and Professional Experience

Paula Goode holds a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration from City University and an AutoCAD Certificate. She has worked in several fields, including time as a reconciler in the banking industry, drawing and structural drafting, designing fire control plans for cruise ships, and working as a fire alarm account representative.

## Contact

Residents can reach Councilmember Goode by phone at 206-368-5440, Ext. 258 or [email Councilmember Goode](mailto:pgoode@cityoflfp.gov).
